amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to implement or enforce the threatened species or endangered species listing of any plant or wildlife that has not undergone a periodic 5 year review as required by section 4(c)(2) of the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A053) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 190 (Roll no. 449).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A053) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 190 (Roll no. 449).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
